main

Class Worker

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Worker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Worker class is responsible for checking a BlockingQueue<FileQueue> and take actions related to unduplicate already indexed files.
    Author:
    vliopard

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private long filesReplaced

      private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileQueue> transferQueue 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Worker(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileQueue> fileQueue, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.lang.Integer> signalQueue)
      Worker Constructor - Initializes a Worker object that starts to keep files unduplicated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String addLeadingZeros(long numberToFormat)
      This method adds leading zeros to a String representation of a number to keep display organized in columns.
      void clear()
      This method clear the hash map database for starting a new fresh unduplicate task.
      private void consume(java.lang.Object fileQueueObject)
      This method will work on each FileQueue object to determine if a file is new on directory of if it already exist for taking the right action.
      private static void err(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method displays an error message through the embedded log system.
      private void includeFileToHashTable(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method includes a new fresh file to the hash table database or replaces the file content to a path that points to its identical file already added to the hash table database.
      void load()
      This method loads the hash map database from disk to restart later saved unduplication tasks.
      private static void log(java.lang.String logMessage)
      This method displays a log message through the embedded log system.
      private static void msg(java.lang.String message)
      This method displays a message through the embedded log system.
      private void replaceFileFromHashTable(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method removes an already included file in the hash table database in case it is deleted from file system.
      void run()
      This is the runnable method that starts background processing of file system contents.
      void save()
      This method saves the hash map of included files for later use.
      long size()
      This method returns the size of the hash map database to inform how many items are already worked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Worker

        Worker(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileQueue> fileQueue,
      java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.lang.Integer> signalQueue)
        Worker Constructor - Initializes a Worker object that starts to keep files unduplicated.
        Parameters:
        fileQueue - A BlockingQueue<FileQueue> containing all the file system notifications sent from Monitor class.
        signalQueue - A BlockingQueue<Integer> that will receive signals to shutdown gracefully.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This is the runnable method that starts background processing of file system contents.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • save

        public void save()
        This method saves the hash map of included files for later use.

        public void clear()
        This method clear the hash map database for starting a new fresh unduplicate task.

      • size

        public long size()
        This method returns the size of the hash map database to inform how many items are already worked.
        Returns:
        Returns a long value with the size of the file hash database.

      • load

        public void load()
        This method loads the hash map database from disk to restart later saved unduplication tasks.

      • consume

        private void consume(java.lang.Object fileQueueObject)
        This method will work on each FileQueue object to determine if a file is new on directory of if it already exist for taking the right action.
        Parameters:
        fileQueueObject - A FileQueue object containing an file system action code and a path to the working file.

      • includeFileToHashTable

        private void includeFileToHashTable(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method includes a new fresh file to the hash table database or replaces the file content to a path that points to its identical file already added to the hash table database.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String containing a file location path.

      • replaceFileFromHashTable

        private void replaceFileFromHashTable(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method removes an already included file in the hash table database in case it is deleted from file system.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String containing a file location path.

      • addLeadingZeros

        private java.lang.String addLeadingZeros(long numberToFormat)
        This method adds leading zeros to a String representation of a number to keep display organized in columns.
        Parameters:
        numberToFormat - A long number that will receive leading zeros.
        Returns:
        Returns an String representing a long number with leading zeros.
